coreAtributes.authorTag: On the inside of the shell, faint rubberised ink reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's riot helmet
coreAtributes.description: A visored, shock absorbing helmet with a ballistic outer shell. The attached neck protector keeps flammable liquids from running down the wearer's back. The attached chinstrap has plenty of adjustment to fit a variety of head shapes.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] on the riot helmet and securely [npc.verb(fasten)] the chinstrap.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] the riot helmet on [npc2.namePos] head and securely [npc.verb(fasten)] the chinstrap.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] the riot helmet down on [npc2.namePos] head and practically [npc.verb(gag)] [npc2.her] with the chinstrap.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] un[npc.do] the chinstrap on [npc.her] riot helmet and [npc.verb(ease)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] un[npc.do] the chinstrap on [npc2.namePos] riot helmet and [npc.verb(ease)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rip)] open the chinstrap on [npc2.namePos] riot helmet and [npc.verb(yank)] it off [npc2.her] neck.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lower)] the visor on [npc.her] riot helmet down over [npc.her] [npc.faceD].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lower)] the visor on [npc2.namePos] riot helmet down over [npc2.her] [npc2.faceD].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slam)] the visor on [npc2.namePos] riot helmet down over [npc2.her] [npc2.faceD].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(raise)] the visor on [npc.her] riot helmet, exposing [npc.her] [npc.faceD].

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(flip)] the visor on [npc2.namePos] riot helmet up, exposing [npc2.her] [npc2.faceD].
